text: Te, kotoryye uvlekalis' usladami zemnoy zhizni s yeyo prelestyami, otritsayut voskreseniye, khotya fakty dokazyvayut voskreseniye posle dolgogo pokoya. Ob etom rasskaz ob obitatelyakh gornoy peshchery, o kotorykh govoritsya v "ar-Rakim" (skrizhali, na kotoroy byli nachertany ikh imena posle ikh smerti). Etot rasskaz ne yavlyayetsya yedinstvennym chudom sredi Nashikh znameniy, nesmotrya na yego isklyuchitel'nost'. Ved' net chudesneye Nashikh znameniy, dokazyvayushchikh Nashe mogushchestvo
